articles.title: Did you follow the local news this week? Take our Greater Boston news quiz.
articles.description:
Berklee honors Bob, Kim Khazei calls it quits, and Boston gets a new candy craze in this week’s news quiz.

The post Did you follow the local news this week? Take our Greater Boston news quiz. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Berklee College honors Bob Dylan for his contributions to music.
Kim Khazei announces retirement after years as a local news anchor.
Boston introduces a new candy craze, impacting local confectionery businesses.
